channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Matrix Authorization Strategy Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Matrix Authorization Strategy Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21623|2024-08-03T18:16:23.861Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20matrix%20authorization%20strategy%20plugin
item.description: An incorrect permission check in Jenkins Matrix Authorization Strategy Plugin 2.6.5 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Read permission on nested items to access them, even if they lack Item/Read permission for parent folders.
